net.sf.appia.xml.templates
Class SessionTemplate

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.appia.xml.templates.SessionTemplate

public class SessionTemplate
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements a session template. It is used to generate one or more sessions.

The number of sessions generated is determined based on the defined scope.

Author:
Jose Mocito

Constructor Summary
SessionTemplate(java.lang.String name, int sharing, Layer layer)
          Builds a session template.

          Returns the Session built from this template depending on the sharing property of this session template and, if necessary, the given label.

Constructor Detail

SessionTemplate

public SessionTemplate(java.lang.String name,
                       int sharing,
                       Layer layer)
Builds a session template.

Parameters:
name - the name of the session template.
sharing - the sharing scope of the session template.
layer - the Layer associated with this session template.
Method Detail

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
Returns the name associated to this session template.

Returns:
a String containing the name.

getSharingState

public int getSharingState()
Returns the sharing property associated to this session template.

Returns:
an integer representing the sharing state whose values are obtained from SharingState.
See Also:
SharingState

layerInstance

Returns the Layer instance associated to this session template.

Returns:

                               java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,Session> sharedSessions)
Returns the Session built from this template depending on the sharing property of this session template and, if necessary, the given label.

the Session built from this template.
